description: Non-Material Amendment to planning permission ref. 43762/APP/2018/396, dated 12-10-2018 for 'Demolition of vacant Maple and Poplar Day Centre and construction of 34 residential units (description as amended by application reference 43762/APP/2023/573)' to add steel supports to a number of balconies.
decision_conditions: Condition 1 of planning permission reference 43762/APP/2022/3588 is amended to:
'The development hereby permitted shall not be carried out except in complete accordance with the details shown on the submitted plans, numbers:
1210/P Rev. 01 (Unit Type A and B - M4(3) Floor Plans)
PL 24; and shall thereafter be retained/maintained for as long as the development remains in existence.
To ensure the development complies with the provisions Hillingdon Local Plan Parts 1 (November 2012) and 2 (January 2020) and the London Plan (2021).'

Notwithstanding the non-material amendment hereby approved, all other conditions relating to planning permission ref: 43762/APP/2022/3588 must be discharged/adhered to as per that permission or later consents.
